CONTACT.SUBMITTED_DETAILS: You should receive a confirmation email. I'll get back to you as soon as I can!
CONTACT.SUBMITTED_ERROR: Message not sent. Something went wrong.

OVERVIEW.ABOUT_ME: I'm Nicholas, a full-stack software developer with experience in robotics and SaaS products! If you find me without a cup of coffee, it's because I haven't left the machine yet!

ARVP.TITLE: Autonomous Robotic Vehicle Project
ARVP.SUBTITLE: Engineering Club at the University of Alberta

FINANCE_AGGREGATOR.DESCRIPTION: Aggregates financial data from multiple sources. Can't handle the hassle of standardizing the umpteen CSV formats your banks use? This tool might be for you!

SHAPE_MATCHER.DESCRIPTION: A tool I wrote as a deep learning alternative for a computer vision task. It uses properties of contrast in underwater images (and shape priors) to identify objects of interest.

ARVP_ONBOARDING_2019.DESCRIPTION: A tutorial I wrote for new members of ARVP to get up to speed. It walks developers through commanding a simulated AUV to complete a simple obstacle course.

YEET_MIND.DESCRIPTION: At HackeEd 2019 my team wrote a tool that maps EKG signals through an SVM to control a car. We won 3rd place!

PRE_UNIVERSITY_PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: A collection of games I wrote to teach myself to code circa 2010-2017.
